\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w swore|strong="H5375"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w into|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* land \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H3027"\w* \w searched|strong="H8446"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* land \w flowing|strong="H2100"\w* \w with|strong="H2100"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w glory|strong="H6643"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* lands.
